title: England, Scotland relax travel restrictions for vaccinated Americans, who will no longer have to quarantine
content:
1. England, Scotland relax travel restrictions for vaccinated Americans, who will no longer have to quarantine  USA TODAY
  2. Covid: No quarantine for fully jabbed US and EU travellers  BBC News
  3. Fully Vaccinated Americans Can Skip Quarantine When Traveling To U.K.  MSNBC
  4. Double-jabbed US and EU travellers can avoid England quarantine, ministers decide  The Guardian
  5. Travel industry reacts to removal of quarantine for fully jabbed EU and US arrivals – Business Traveller  Business Traveller
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: イングランドとスコットランド、ワクチン接種した米国人の渡航制限を緩和。
